Articles.Content:
First of all as a non technical person I want to thank the modding community for some really amazing work and relentless updates over the years.  Hats off to you all.

I was wondering if the mod called "For Science" might see an update to it.  I have been away from the game for some time and now that I am back I find that I really miss some of my mods and in particular "For Science".  I really enjoy building the craft, launching and flying.  But I always forget to collect the data in a timely manner and this mod just saves my behind.  Any news would be welcome if there is any out there. 

Thanks again and keep up the great work
I've not played it in 1.9 (I'm stuck on 1.8.1 until Kopernicus updates. Not that I'm really feeling I'm missing anything) and the ForScience version that @VoidCosmoslinked works fine for me.
Welcome to the forum @mazimo, your question has been moved to add-on discussions.
